The movie is an action-packed fantasy film that tells the story of a young archaeologist who thinks he is cursed by an Aztec mask that makes him have strange nightmares. Before committing suicide, he sends the mask to his psychiatrist, who soon plunges into the mask' s nightmarish world.

Based on the provided preference cues, I recommend two movies: "The Baader Meinhof Complex" and "The Dark Knight".

"The Baader Meinhof Complex", released in 2008, is a documentary film directed by Peter Boesky and Mark Weisbard. It covers the history of an international revolutionary group known as The Red Army Faction (RAF) 1960 -- '70s  during the Cold War between Western Europe and Russia.

The film features interviews with former members of RAF, such as Johanna Wokalek, Bruno Ganz, Moritz Bleibtreu, Moritz Bleibtreu, Martina Gedeck, Martina Gedeck, Alexandra Maria Lara, who provide insights into the history, tactics, and motivations of members of RAF.

In addition to interviews with former members of RAF, the film also features footage from various sources, including newsreels, documentaries, and other sources, which provide additional context and information about the history, tactics, and motivations of members of RAF.
